price: 61. Ken abbobti, Ibraahim sinam foocah kaa baaha iyyen iyyeemil kaal sumaaqitaanaah wohul kaat takke digaala yableeniggidah iyyen.
arabic: قَالُواْ فَأۡتُواْ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū fatū bihi ʿalā aʿyuni al-nāsi laʿallahum yashhadūna
